commands.name: az network public-ip ddos-protection show
commands.summary: Get the DDoS protection status of a public IP address.
commands.syntax:
az network public-ip ddos-protection show [--ids]
                                          [--name]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--subscription]
examples: az network public-ip ddos-protection show -n MyPublicIp -g MyResourceGroup
